body.p:
Paducah Ky Febry 14th 1864
Gov. Bramlette
Dr Sir

I understand a petition has gone up to excuse Samuel Miles from payment of $3000 as security for appearance of Wm Miles indcited in Ballard County for Robbing - It is an outrageous Case & two of his comrades have been tried & convicted one 17 years (since ) the other for Jas Hudgins for 5 years Wm Miles has joined the rebel army & Samuel Miles is also a rebel sympathizer - If there was any merit in the case I would say so - on the contrary Samuel Miles & family have favored the escape of Wm & prevented recapture - he also tried to sell his farm to defraud the court & I restrained him from doing so
A similar case also exists in Ballard in forfeited bonds of 2 or 3 lemons for hog stealing

yours &C
P D Yeiser
Coml atty
